TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Html32TextWriter extends System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter

summary.span: 向 ASP.NET 服务器控件的输出流写入一系列特定于 HTML 3.2 的字符和文本。

span.span: Writes a series of HTML 3.2–specific characters and text to the output stream for an ASP.NET server control.

summary.span: 类提供 ASP.NET 服务器控件在将 HTML 3.2 内容呈现给客户端时所使用的格式化功能。

span.span: The class provides formatting capabilities that ASP.NET server controls use when rendering HTML 3.2 content to clients.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类是一种替代方法类。The class is an alternative to the class. 它将等效的 HTML 3.2 标记和属性转换为 HTML 4.0 的样式特性。It converts HTML 4.0 style attributes into the equivalent HTML 3.2 tags and attributes. 它标准化属性，如颜色和字体，使用 HTML 表的传播。It standardizes the propagation of attributes, such as colors and fonts, using HTML tables. ASP.NET 会自动将此类用于 HTML 3.2 和早期的浏览器通过检查属性的类。ASP.NET automatically uses this class for HTML 3.2 and earlier browsers by checking the property of the class. 除非创建自定义页或控件适配器，以使用 HTML 3.2 标记的设备为目标时，不需要创建的实例显式类。Unless you create a custom page or control adapter that targets devices that use HTML 3.2 markup, you do not need to create an instance of the class explicitly. 有关自定义页面和控件呈现的详细信息，请参阅[演练： 开发和使用自定义 Web 服务器控件](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For more information about customizing page and control rendering, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用名为的类`CustomHtml32TextWriter`，派生类。The following code example demonstrates how to use a class, named `CustomHtml32TextWriter`, that derives from the class. `CustomHtml32TextWriter` 创建遵循建立的模式的两个构造函数类，并重写， ， ，和方法。`CustomHtml32TextWriter` creates two constructors that follow the pattern that is established by the class and overrides the , , , and methods. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.Html32TextWriter_Samples1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Html32TextWriter_Samples1/cs/html32textwritersamps.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.Html32TextWriter_Samples1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Html32TextWriter_Samples1/VB/html32textwritersamps.vb#1)]

related.span: 演练： 开发和使用自定义服务器控件

span.span: Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Server Control

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例，该类在请求浏览器要求行缩进时使用 字段中指定的行缩进。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class that uses the line indentation that is specified in the field when the requesting browser requires line indentation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 构造函数传递字段到第二个版本具有以下两个参数的值：The constructor passes the field value to a second version that has the following two parameters: - `writer`其将实例类。`writer`, which takes an instance of the class. - `tabString`后者采用一个字符串来定义行缩进值。`tabString`, which takes a string that defines line indentation. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用派生的自定义类类。The following code example demonstrates how to use a custom class that derives from the class. 它有两个构造函数，这是标准的所有直接或间接派生的类类。It has two constructors, which is standard for all classes that derive directly or indirectly from the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.Html32TextWriter_Samples1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Html32TextWriter_Samples1/cs/html32textwritersamps.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.Html32TextWriter_Samples1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Html32TextWriter_Samples1/VB/html32textwritersamps.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果属性是`true`，则方法将替换任何`div`由使用控件呈现的元素`table`元素。If the property is `true`, the method replaces any `div` elements that are rendered by a control with `table` elements.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance string RenderAfterContent() cil managed
Protected Overrides Function RenderAfterContent () As String

summary.span: 写入在 HTML 元素内容之后出现的所有文本或间距。

span.span: Writes any text or spacing that appears after the content of the HTML element.

returns.span: 要在 HTML 元素内容之后写入的间距或文本；如果没有此类信息要呈现，则为 。

span.span: The spacing or text to write after the content of the HTML element; otherwise, if there is no such information to render, .

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写方法。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method. 每个重写方法首先检查是否`th`元素要呈现，然后使用方法来检查请求设备是否可以显示粗体格式。Each overridden method first checks whether a `th` element is being rendered, and then uses the method to check whether the requesting device can display bold formatting. 如果设备支持粗体格式方法将写入的结束标记`b`元素。If the device supports bold formatting, the method writes the closing tag of a `b` element. 如果设备不支持粗体格式方法将写入的结束标记`font`元素。If the device does not support bold formatting, the method writes the closing tag of a `font` element. 接下来，代码将检查是否`h4`元素要呈现，然后使用属性来检查请求设备是否可以显示斜体格式。Next, the code checks whether an `h4` element is being rendered, and then uses the property to check whether the requesting device can display italic formatting. 如果设备支持斜体格式，方法将写入的结束标记`i`元素。If the device supports italic formatting, the method writes the closing tag of an `i` element. 如果设备不支持斜体格式，方法将写入的结束标记`font`元素。If the device does not support italic formatting, the method writes the closing tag of a `font` element. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.Html32TextWriter_Samples1#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Html32TextWriter_Samples1/cs/html32textwritersamps.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.Html32TextWriter_Samples1#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Html32TextWriter_Samples1/VB/html32textwritersamps.vb#4)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance string RenderAfterTag() cil managed
Protected Overrides Function RenderAfterTag () As String

summary.span: 写出任何在 HTML 元素的结束标记之后出现的间距或文本。

span.span: Writes any spacing or text that occurs after an HTML element's closing tag.

returns.span: 要在 HTML 元素的结束标记之后写入的间距或文本；如果没有此类信息要呈现，则为 。

span.span: The spacing or text to write after the closing tag of the HTML element; otherwise, if there is no such information to render, .

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写方法。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method. 代码将检查是否`a`元素呈现。The code checks whether an `a` element is being rendered. 如果是这样，方法将写入的结束标记`small`元素。If so, the method writes the closing tag of a `small` element. 有关示例方法执行相同的检查`a`元素，然后将写入的开始标记`small`元素。The example for the method performs the same check for the `a` element, and then writes the opening tag of the `small` element. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.Html32TextWriter_Samples1#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Html32TextWriter_Samples1/cs/html32textwritersamps.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.Html32TextWriter_Samples1#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Html32TextWriter_Samples1/VB/html32textwritersamps.vb#5)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance string RenderBeforeContent() cil managed
Protected Overrides Function RenderBeforeContent () As String

summary.span: 写入在 HTML 元素中包含的内容之前出现的所有制表符间距或字体信息。

span.span: Writes any tab spacing or font information that appears before the content that is contained in an HTML element.

returns.span: 要在呈现 HTML 元素的内容之前写入的字体信息和间距；如果没有此类信息要呈现，则为 。

span.span: The font information or spacing to write before rendering the content of the HTML element; otherwise, if there is no such information to render, .

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写方法。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method. 代码将检查是否`th`元素要呈现，然后使用方法来检查请求设备是否可以显示粗体格式。The code checks whether a `th` element is being rendered, and then uses the method to check whether the requesting device can display bold formatting. 如果设备支持粗体格式方法将开始标记写入`b`元素。If the device supports bold formatting, the method writes the opening tag of a `b` element. 如果设备不支持粗体格式方法将开始标记写入`font`具有元素`color`属性设置为红色的十六进制值。If the device does not support bold formatting, the method writes the opening tag of a `font` element with a `color` attribute set to the hexadecimal value for red. 接下来，将每个方法检查是否`h4`元素要呈现，然后使用属性来检查请求设备是否可以显示斜体格式。Next, each method checks whether an `h4` element is being rendered, and then uses the property to check whether the requesting device can display italic formatting. 如果设备支持斜体格式，方法将开始标记写入`i`元素。If the device supports italic formatting, the method writes the opening tag of an `i` element. 如果设备不支持斜体格式，方法将开始标记写入`font`具有元素`color`属性设置为海军蓝色的十六进制值。If the device does not support italic formatting, the method writes the opening tag of a `font` element with a `color` attribute set to the hexadecimal value for navy blue. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.Html32TextWriter_Samples1#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Html32TextWriter_Samples1/cs/html32textwritersamps.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.Html32TextWriter_Samples1#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Html32TextWriter_Samples1/VB/html32textwritersamps.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance string RenderBeforeTag() cil managed
Protected Overrides Function RenderBeforeTag () As String

summary.span: 将在 HTML 元素的开始标记之前出现的所有文本或制表符间距写入 HTML 3.2 输出流。

span.span: Writes any text or tab spacing that occurs before the opening tag of an HTML element to the HTML 3.2 output stream.

returns.span: 要在标记之前呈现的 HTML 字体和间距信息；如果没有此类信息要呈现，则为 。

span.span: The HTML font and spacing information to render before the tag; otherwise, if there is no such information to render, .

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写方法。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method. 代码将检查是否`a`元素呈现。The code checks whether an `a` element is being rendered. 如果是这样，重写方法将开始标记写入`small`元素。If so, the overridden method writes the opening tag of a `small` element. 有关示例执行相同的检查`a`元素，然后将写入的结束标记`small`元素。The sample for the performs the same check for the `a` element, and then writes the closing tag of the `small` element. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.Html32TextWriter_Samples1#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Html32TextWriter_Samples1/cs/html32textwritersamps.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.Html32TextWriter_Samples1#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Html32TextWriter_Samples1/VB/html32textwritersamps.vb#3)]

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写和方法。The following code example demonstrates how to override the and methods. 每个重写检查是否`Label`元素要呈现，然后使用方法来检查请求设备是否可以显示粗体格式。Each override checks whether a `Label` element is being rendered, and then uses the method to check whether the requesting device can display bold formatting. 如果设备支持粗体格式方法将开始标记写入`b`元素和方法写入结束标记。If the device supports bold formatting, the method writes the opening tag of a `b` element and the method writes its closing tag. 如果设备不支持粗体格式方法将开始标记写入`Font`具有元素`color`属性设置为红色，十六进制值和方法写入结束标记。If the device does not support bold formatting, the method writes the opening tag of a `Font` element with a `color` attribute set to the hexadecimal value for red, and the method writes the closing tag. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写和方法。The following code example demonstrates how to override the and methods. 每个重写检查是否`span`元素要呈现，然后使用属性来检查请求设备是否可以显示斜体格式。Each override checks whether a `span` element is being rendered, and then uses the property to check whether the requesting device can display italic formatting. 如果设备支持斜体格式，方法将开始标记写入`i`元素和方法写入结束标记。If the device supports italic formatting, the method writes the opening tag of an `i` element and the method writes its closing tag. 如果设备不支持斜体格式，方法将开始标记写入`Font`具有元素`color`属性设置为海军蓝色的十六进制值和方法写入结束标记。If the device does not support italic formatting, the method writes the opening tag of a `Font` element with a `color` attribute set to the hexadecimal value for navy blue, and the method writes the closing tag. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.Html32TextWriter_Samples1#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Html32TextWriter_Samples1/cs/html32textwritersamps.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.Html32TextWriter_Samples1#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Html32TextWriter_Samples1/VB/html32textwritersamps.vb#2)]
